## Type of Change

<!-- Check the ONE that applies. A PR must address a single concern. -->

- [ ] `feat` — New feature or check
- [ ] `fix` — Bug fix
- [ ] `docs` — Documentation only
- [ ] `chore` — Tooling, CI, release, dependency updates
- [ ] `refactor` — Code restructuring (no behaviour change)
- [ ] `test` — Test-only changes
- [ ] `ci` — CI/CD workflow changes

## Checklist

- [ ] **Single concern** — this PR contains one feature, one fix, OR one chore (not mixed)
- [ ] **Commits follow [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/en/v1.0.0/)** format
- [ ] **Tests added/updated** for all code changes (`feat` or `fix`)
- [ ] **CHANGELOG.md updated** (for `feat` or `fix` changes)
- [ ] `make test` passes locally
